name: Among Knights: Game
description:
Among Knights is an Adventure 2D Game that tells a wonderful story of an ancient war between Knights and mutants.

Among Knights game comes with easy and enjoyable game play in an amazing 2D environment, with several places following the story for the first season of the game.

the game's story tells the destiny of a young Knight who was fated to revenge the death of his father and finds out some truth about the squid trick game of the giant mutant, and the spy ear who betrayed your father.

Dive into the story of Among Knights game, with the young knight, and defeat some of those mutants in pursuit of their leaders who called the Giant Mutant! There's plenty to find, but one misstep and it's all over.

Show everyone that you deserve the knighthood of a hero,

prove them that you are "Rainer" son of the wolf, as a start of the second Season of the game.

Enjoy the experience, LR Studio best regards.
